item.title: Reid & Marissa's Rehearsal Dinner
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Tonight was the Rehearsal Dinner for Reid & Marissa's wedding at The Harbor Club in downtown Seattle, which has a great view of Elliot Bay all the way to Mt. Rainier. The usual people were there and we met a few other friends and people from Marissa's family. A surprise was to see Eric Wagner there, who was supposed to be on their boat in Panama. We last saw them in December in Mexico.
